help.how-to-update-shortcuts.question.message: How do I update the keyboard shortcuts mapping for the different sorting methods?

help.how-to-update-shortcuts.answer.message: The extension comes with predefined shortcuts for some of the proposed sorting methods. You can change them via Firefox directly. For more information, see: Manage extension shortcuts in Firefox

command-sort-tabs-url.description: Button for sorting tabs by URL.

command-sort-tabs-mru.description: Button for sorting tabs by most recently used

command-sort-tabs-title.description: Button for sorting tabs by title

command-sort-tabs-favicon-and-title.description: Button for sorting tabs by most recently used

change-addons-preferences.description: Link to access the Firefox's about:addons page

ui-click-checkbox-sort-tabs-all-windows.description: Sorting tabs also in other windows

ui-click-checkbox-sort-tabs-auto-on-new-.message: Sort tabs when a new tab is opened.
ui-click-checkbox-sort-tabs-auto-on-new-.description: Checkbox Sort tabs when a new tab is opened.

ui-change-select-sort-select-tabs-defaul.message: Default sort method for auto sort on new tab
ui-change-select-sort-select-tabs-defaul.description: Select Default sort method for auto sort on new tab
